job_description:
Junior Geophysicist- Fiber-optic Sensing & AI (Fresno)

We are seeking a motivated Junior Geophysicist (recent graduate) to dive into projects involving Distributed Acoustic Sensing (DAS), fiber‑optic sensor data, and Python‑driven AI analysis. You’ll work closely with geophysicists, data scientists, and engineers to drive data‑centric insights and support field deployments.

Key Responsibilities

  • Support data acquisition, preprocessing, and interpretation from fiber‑optic sensing systems (DAS/DTS).
  • Analyze large time‑series datasets using Python (NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Matplotlib).
  • Collaborate with AI/ML experts to build models for signal classification, event detection, or anomaly identification.
  • Participate in field activities, including deploying sensors, monitoring systems, and validating datasets.
  • Document workflows, results, and technical insights clearly in reports or code comments.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Geophysics, Geoscience, Physics, Engineering, or related discipline.
  • Fundamental understanding of seismic wave behavior and fiber‑optic sensing principles.
  • Basic proficiency in Python and experience with data‑analysis libraries.
  • Interest in machine learning—any exposure to scikit‑learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch is a plus.
  • Excellent analytical thinking, communication skills, and collaborative mindset.

Preferred (Nice-to-Have)

  • Experience with signal processing, time‑series analysis, or seismic inversion methods.
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and Jupyter notebooks.
  • Willingness and physical ability to participate in occasional fieldwork and travel.

What You’ll Gain

  • Hands‑on experience at the intersection of geophysics, fiber‑optic sensing, and AI.
  • Mentorship from industry professionals and cross‑disciplinary collaboration.
  • Exposure to real‑world problems in energy, infrastructure, and environmental monitoring.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at lakshmi@team.tranzmeo.com
summary: Junior Geophysicist sought for fiber-optic sensing and AI projects. Will analyze data, build models, and support field deployments. Recent graduates encouraged to apply.

job_description:
Technical Lead - Data Science & Machine Learning

Tranzmeo is a leader in the fiber optic sensing industry, developing cutting-edge solutions for pipeline monitoring, well monitoring, railway, aerospace, defense, and other applications. We utilize AI, ML, and Big Data to advance sensing technology and provide real-time insights.

We are seeking a passionate and experienced Technical Lead to spearhead our Data Science & Machine Learning initiatives. If you are enthusiastic about applying AI/ML to advanced sensing technologies and making a tangible impact, we encourage you to apply!

What You'll Do:

  • Lead the design, development, and deployment of scalable AI/ML models for fiber optic sensing data.
  • Architect Big Data solutions for real-time processing of extensive sensing data.
  • Collaborate with product teams, sensor engineers, and stakeholders on innovative projects.
  • Mentor and manage a team of data scientists and engineers.
  • Ensure data quality, model performance, and security standards.
  • Stay current with advancements in AI/ML and fiber optic sensing to drive innovation.

What We're Looking For:

  • B.Tech in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field.
  • 6+ years of experience in data science, machine learning, and Big Data, ideally in sensing or telecom.
  • Proven leadership and team management capabilities.
  • Strong programming proficiency in Python.
  • Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.
  • Hands-on experience with ML frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.
  • Proficiency in Big Data tools including Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, and Airflow.
  • A good understanding of fiber optic sensing technologies and their data characteristics is advantageous.
  • Excellent problem-solving, communication, and collaboration skills.

Why Join Us?

  • Engage in innovative sensing technology projects with significant real-world impact.
  • Lead AI and ML strategies within a pioneering industry.
  • Thrive in a dynamic and growth-oriented work environment.
  • Contribute to shaping the future of fiber optic sensing solutions.

Job Details: - Employment: Full-time - Industry: Software Development

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, please send your updated resume to hr@tranzmeo.com.

job_description:
Product Owner

Company: TECHVANTAGE SYSTEMS (P) Ltd

Locations: - Module L1A, Level -1, Thejaswini, Technopark, Trivandrum - 2nd floor, Amstor House, Technopark campus, phase-1, Trivandrum , 695581

Website: http://www.techvantagesystems.com

Contact Email: jobs@techvantagesystems.com

Job Published: 13, Sept 2025

Closing Date: 21, Sept 2025

Brief Description

As a Product Owner, you will define the vision and roadmap, acting as the bridge between stakeholders and engineering. You’ll ensure solutions are technically sound, user-focused, and impactful. Working with product managers, engineers, designers, and clients, you’ll turn business needs into intuitive, scalable product experiences.

If you’re passionate about technology, collaboration, and delivering products that drive measurable outcomes, we’d love to hear from you.

Key Responsibilities

  • Act as the primary liaison between stakeholders and engineering, aligning objectives and deliverables.
  • Own and prioritize the product backlog, balancing features, enhancements, and technical debt.
  • Lead requirements gathering and translate needs into user stories with clear acceptance criteria.
  • Facilitate Scrum ceremonies, including standups, sprint planning, refinements, reviews, and retrospectives.
  • Refine and decompose backlog items with engineers, providing timely clarification and estimates.
  • Partner with UX/UI to design intuitive and accessible product experiences.
  • Demonstrate sprint deliverables, capture feedback, and adjust priorities as needed.
  • Track and analyze product metrics and user feedback to inform backlog decisions.
  • Communicate updates, changes, and progress clearly to all stakeholders.
  • Maintain and distribute release notes after each sprint to ensure transparency.
  • Proactively identify, triage, and resolve issues to keep delivery on track.
  • Share customer and market insights with the team to guide product decisions.
  • Remove roadblocks and drive consensus across stakeholders.
  • Ensure compliance with relevant standards such as FERPA, accessibility, and LMS integrations.
  • Champion the voice of the customer to ensure all work delivers measurable value.

Preferred Skills

  • 3+ years of experience as a Product Owner or similar product role, ideally in SaaS.
  • Hands-on experience working directly with software engineers in an Agile development environment.
  • Strong knowledge of the Scrum framework with proven experience in story mapping and writing clear acceptance criteria.
  • Ability to triage and resolve issues quickly, including leading incident investigations when needed.
  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to collaborate across technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Effective listener and influencer who builds strong partnerships and drives alignment on priorities.
  • Strong analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and user feedback to inform backlog decisions.
  • Comfortable working in a startup or fast-paced environment with a willingness to be hands-on.
  • Experience in EdTech is an added advantage.
  • Proficiency with Agile project management tools such as Jira and Confluence.
  • Familiarity with analytics and visualization tools to support data-driven decisions.
  • Strong conflict resolution and consensus-building skills to align diverse stakeholders.
  • High level of empathy for users and attention to detail in defining backlog items.
  • Ability to adapt quickly to changing priorities and maintain team focus under pressure.
  • Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field; CSPO or PSPO certification is a plus.
summary: Product Owner to define vision and roadmap, bridging stakeholders and engineering. Transform business needs into scalable product experiences through collaboration and Agile methodologies.

job_description:
Senior Software Architect

Company: Spericorn Technology (P) Ltd Location: Amstor Building, Technopark Phase I, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.spericorn.com

Job Published: 13, Sept 2025 Closing Date: 30, Sept 2025

Contact Email: careers@spericorn.com

Brief Description

Spericorn Technology is seeking a seasoned Senior Software Architect to spearhead the technical direction of complex, scalable, and secure systems. This role requires a deep understanding of modern software architecture patterns and hands-on experience in building robust solutions for banking, financial platforms, and e-commerce systems with high transaction volumes. You will be instrumental in driving architectural decisions, leading engineering discussions, and guiding the technical execution of large-scale digital products.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead architectural strategy, design, and implementation for enterprise-grade applications.
  • Collaborate with product, DevOps, and engineering teams to translate business requirements into scalable, secure, and resilient architectures.
  • Own the architecture lifecycle, including blueprinting, documentation, system evaluation, and refactoring.
  • Conduct architecture reviews and ensure adherence to best practices, coding standards, and security guidelines.
  • Evaluate and recommend tools, technologies, and frameworks aligned with architectural vision.
  • Enable DevOps automation, CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, and observability standards.
  • Provide mentorship and technical leadership to engineering teams across domains.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience: 7+ years in software development, with at least 3 years in a lead or architect role.
  • Distributed Systems: Proven experience designing distributed systems, large-scale APIs, and microservices-based applications.
  • Architectural Patterns: Strong background in event-driven architecture, asynchronous processing, and domain-driven design (DDD).
  • API Design: Experience with REST, GraphQL, and API-first design principles.
  • Cloud Platforms: Hands-on knowledge of AWS (preferred), Azure, or GCP, with practical experience in services like Lambda, ECS/EKS, S3, API Gateway, DynamoDB, SQS, etc.
  • Containerization: Proficiency in Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, and containerized deployments.
  • Infrastructure as Code: Familiarity with IaC tools like Terraform or AWS CloudFormation.
  • Security: Experience building high-security systems following standards like OWASP, PCI-DSS, and GDPR.
  • Authentication/Authorization: Deep knowledge of authentication, authorization protocols (OAuth2, OIDC, SAML, JWT), and IAM integration.
  • Performance Optimization: Experience designing high-performance systems with caching (Redis, Memcached), CDN strategies, and request optimization.
  • Data Modeling: Strong data modeling experience with RDBMS (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Cassandra).
  • Messaging/Streaming: Exposure to messaging and streaming systems such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, or Amazon EventBridge.
  • Programming Languages: Experience with one or more of the following: Java, Python, Node.js, TypeScript, .NET, or Go.
  • CI/CD & Version Control: Familiarity with CI/CD tools (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI) and version control systems like Git.
  • Observability: Understanding of observability, monitoring, and logging using tools like Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, or Datadog.
  • Domain Experience: Experience in architecting digital platforms in the banking, fintech, or e-commerce domains.
  • Emerging Tech: Exposure to Blockchain technologies, smart contracts, and decentralized systems.
  • Soft Skills: Strong analytical, communication, and documentation skills with a leadership mindset.

What We Offer:

  • Leadership role in architecting business-critical digital platforms.
  • Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and innovation-driven teams.
  • Competitive compensation and benefits package.
  • Opportunities for continuous learning and certifications.
  • A dynamic and flexible work environment.

Note: Kindly mention in the email subject "Application for the post of Senior Software Architect."
summary: Seeking a Senior Software Architect to lead technical direction for scalable systems in banking, finance, and e-commerce. This role involves architectural strategy, design, and execution of digital products.

job_description:
MongoDB Specialist

Company: Gruppozenit India (P) Ltd Location: Technopark, Trivandrum Contact Email: careers@gruppozenit.com Website: http://www.gruppozenit.com Application Closing Date: 30 September 2025 Job Published: 12 September 2025

Brief Description

The ideal candidate will be responsible for the installation, configuration, monitoring, performance tuning, backup, recovery, and security management of MongoDB databases. This role also involves troubleshooting, issue resolution, maintaining documentation, and providing technical guidance to team members.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Installation and Configuration: Installing and configuring MongoDB on servers for optimal performance, including setting up replication, sharding, and security parameters.
  • Monitoring and Performance Tuning: Monitoring MongoDB cluster health and performance, identifying bottlenecks, and optimizing the database through query analysis, indexing, and resource utilization.
  • Backup and Recovery: Implementing robust backup and recovery strategies to ensure data integrity and availability, including regular backups, replication for fault tolerance, and data restores.
  • Security Management: Securing the MongoDB environment by configuring access controls, authentication, and encryption, and managing user accounts, roles, and permissions.
  • Capacity Planning: Assessing resource requirements for MongoDB deployments and planning for future growth through horizontal (sharding) and vertical scaling.
  • Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution: Diagnosing and resolving database issues such as performance degradation, connectivity problems, or data inconsistencies by analyzing logs and applying solutions.
  • Documentation and Guidance: Maintaining comprehensive database documentation (configurations, procedures, best practices) and providing technical guidance to team members on database interactions and optimization.

Requirements:

  • 3-5 years of experience as a Database Administrator, with a strong focus on MongoDB.
  • Knowledge of MongoDB versions 4.2 and higher.
  • Hands-on experience with MongoDB replication, sharding, and performance tuning.
  • Proficiency in database monitoring tools and troubleshooting techniques.
  • Experience in scripting and automation (e.g., Python, Bash, or PowerShell).
  • Understanding of database security, access control, and data integrity principles.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Good communication skills and ability to work in a team-oriented environment.
  • Familiarity with cloud-based database solutions (AWS, Azure, or GCP) is a plus.

Preferred Skills:

  • MongoDB certification (MongoDB Certified DBA or equivalent) is a plus.
  • Knowledge of SQL and experience with other NoSQL databases.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps methodologies.

Application Instructions: Please mention the Post you are applying with Experience / Current Location in the subject line.
summary: Seeking a MongoDB Specialist with 3-5 years of DBA experience. Responsibilities include installation, configuration, monitoring, tuning, backup, recovery, and security for MongoDB databases.

Senior Embedded Software Engineer - Camera (Android)

Company: ECESIS CARE (P) Ltd Location: Bangalore, Karanataka, India / Trivandrum, Kerala, India Employment Type: Full-time Experience: 1-5 Years Educational Qualification: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science/Electronics/Electrical Engineering or a related Engineering field.

Contact Email: amrithas@ecesistech.com Closing Date: 25, Sept 2025 Job Published: 12, Sept 2025

About Us:

At ECESIS, we have built a strong reputation over the years as a trusted partner in management consulting and talent acquisition, with a specialized focus on the advanced manufacturing sector. Our success is driven by our ability to consistently deliver world-class, high-quality talent, particularly in the areas of precision engineering, assembly line operations, and other skilled manpower across diverse industrial domains. Among our esteemed clients is a listed Japanese company that is set to begin its operations in Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram, further reinforcing our standing as a premier recruitment partner in the region.

Summary:

We are seeking a skilled and experienced Embedded Software Engineer to join our team, focusing specifically on the development and optimization of camera functionality for our embedded devices running on Android. This role will involve working deeply with Quectel smart modules and their underlying platforms, developing and integrating camera drivers, implementing image processing pipelines and ensuring high-quality camera performance tailored to specific application needs.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop and integrate kernel and user space camera drivers for various components including image sensors, autofocus (AF) actuators, EEPROMs and LED flashes.
  • Configure camera-related hardware interfaces, manage GPIOs for control and set up power supplies and power-on/off sequences within the kernel device tree.
  • Implement and configure user space driver parameters, defining sensor output formats (like RAW or YUV), connection modes (such as MIPI CSI), resolutions, frame rates and MIPI CSI lane configurations.
  • Integrate and configure camera tuning data, including chromatix code for Bayer sensors or handle specific configurations required for YUV sensors.
  • Troubleshoot and debug camera bring-up failures, image quality issues and performance bottlenecks by analyzing kernel logs and system behavior, looking for errors like SOF freeze, ERROR_CRC and ERROR_PHY_DL0_FIFO_OVERFLOW.
  • Work on the Android Board Support Package (BSP), focusing on the Camera Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) to provide a consistent programming interface for applications.
  • Utilize standard Android SDK Camera APIs for developing camera-based applications.
  • Collaborate closely with hardware engineers during the component selection phase (image sensors, lenses, processors, etc.) and contribute to the overall embedded camera system design.
  • Perform camera tuning processes to fine-tune hardware and software parameters, achieving optimal performance and image quality for specific applications by adjusting settings like Autofocus (AF), Auto Exposure (AE) and Auto White Balance (AWB).
  • Explore and integrate AI/ML algorithms for advanced vision functionalities such as object detection, facial recognition or predictive analytics. For example, use of AI and machine learning with Quectel modules for road hazard detection.
  • Ensure thermal management considerations are adequately addressed in software design to maintain system efficiency and reliability, especially in demanding operating environments.
  • Implement and execute effective testing procedures under various lighting conditions and scenarios to ensure product reliability and consistent performance.
  • Leverage Hardware Abstraction Layers (HALs) to enhance the flexibility, scalability and future-proofing of camera designs.

Mandatory Skills:

  • Proven experience in embedded software development, with a strong focus on camera systems and Android platforms.
  • Proficiency in C/C++ programming is essential for interacting with system APIs and low-level hardware.
  • Experience with Android BSP and HAL development, specifically the camera HAL, is a key requirement.
  • Familiarity with camera driver development models in both the kernel and user space on Linux/Android systems.
  • Hands-on experience working with camera interfaces such as MIPI CSI.
  • Practical experience in bringing up and configuring camera sensors, including understanding I2C communication, power sequencing and timing.
  • Experience in debugging complex embedded camera systems, including log analysis for hardware and software issues.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience working with Qualcomm multimedia and camera frameworks is highly desirable.
  • Knowledge of image processing concepts and algorithms, including 3A algorithms (AF, AE, AWB), noise reduction and color correction.
  • Experience with specific Quectel smart module series (e.g., SC600Y/T, SC200E/V, SA800U, SG865W).
  • Experience working with Quectel smart modules and Qualcomm processors used in embedded devices is a significant advantage.
  • Understanding of performance optimization techniques for real-time image processing and video streaming.
  • Experience integrating and optimizing AI/ML algorithms within embedded vision systems.
  • Knowledge of relevant communication protocols for camera systems.
  • Experience with camera tuning tools, labs and methodologies.
  • Contribution to open-source projects like LineageOS or Google AOSP.

Behavioral Skills:

  • Leadership Potential
  • Communication Excellence
  • Client Relationship Management
  • Problem-Solving and Analytical Thinking
  • Adaptability and Flexibility
  • Collaboration and Teamwork
  • Ownership and Accountability
  • Proactiveness and Initiative
  • Professionalism and Integrity
  • Time Management and Organization

job_description:
Database Administrator (DBA)

Job Code: CDIPD/DBA/03/2025 Published: 12-Sept-2025 Closing Date: 22-Sept-2025

Contact Email: directorcdipd@duk.ac.in Organization: Kerala University of Digital Sciences, Innovation and Technology Location: Technopark Phase-IV Campus (Technocity), Mangalappuram, Thonnakkal PO, Trivandrum, Kerala, 695317 Website: https://duk.ac.in

About the Centre for Digital Innovation and Product Development (CDIPD)

The Centre for Digital Innovation and Product Development (CDIPD), a Centre of Excellence under Digital University Kerala, is seeking highly qualified Indian Citizens for various project-based positions. CDIPD focuses on enterprise-level projects in Digital Innovation, Digital Transformation, AI, and Data Analytics, adhering to CMMI Level 3 standards. We offer an inclusive, equal opportunity environment with industry-standard facilities and infrastructure, providing excellent career growth opportunities through challenging projects and cutting-edge technologies.

Job Summary

The Database Administrator (DBA) will be responsible for designing, implementing, maintaining, and securing enterprise-level database systems across on-premise and cloud environments. This role requires expertise in ensuring database reliability, availability, and scalability for mission-critical digital solutions. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in database administration, performance tuning, backup and disaster recovery, and supporting agile development teams.

Roles & Responsibilities

  • Design, install, configure, and upgrade enterprise-class database systems (relational and NoSQL).
  • Ensure high availability and disaster recovery of database services using clustering, replication, and backup strategies.
  • Monitor database performance and implement tuning strategies to optimize query execution and resource utilization.
  • Manage database security, including authentication, authorization, auditing, and data encryption.
  • Implement and maintain database backup and recovery solutions aligned with business continuity goals.
  • Collaborate with application development teams to support data modeling, schema design, and performance-aware SQL development.
  • Automate routine DBA tasks using scripts and tools to improve operational efficiency.
  • Conduct regular health checks, audits, and capacity planning for database infrastructure.
  • Participate in cloud migration and modernization projects, including the use of cloud-native database services (AWS RDS, Azure SQL, etc.).
  • Maintain documentation on database configurations, procedures, and operations for compliance and continuity.
  • Provide technical guidance and mentorship on database-related best practices to internal teams.

Qualifications

Essential: - BE/B.Tech/MCA /M.Sc (CS/IT) from a recognized University/Educational Institution.

Desirable: - Certifications related to database administration (e.g., Oracle Certified Associate (OCA), Microsoft SQL Server Certification, PostgreSQL Certification, or equivalent).

Experience

Desirable Experience:

  • Designing and implementing complex database architectures for large-scale enterprise applications.
  • Exposure to cloud-native database solutions (AWS RDS, Azure SQL, Google Cloud SQL) and hybrid cloud deployments.
  • Familiarity with disaster recovery planning, database failover strategies, and real-time data replication tools.
  • Hands-on experience with automation tools and scripting for database maintenance and monitoring (e.g., Shell, Python, Ansible).
  • Strong knowledge of data warehousing concepts, ETL tools, and reporting/BI integration.
  • Knowledge of database migration processes.

Required Skills

  • Proven expertise in managing and maintaining large-scale enterprise-grade database systems (on-premise and cloud).
  • Hands-on experience in database performance tuning, query optimization, indexing strategies, and resolving performance bottlenecks.
  • Proficiency in backup and recovery strategies, disaster recovery planning, replication, and high availability architectures.
  • In-depth knowledge of PL/SQL, stored procedures, triggers, and database design best practices.
  • Familiarity with relational databases (e.g., Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra).
  • Strong understanding of database security practices, including access controls, encryption, and auditing.
  • Experience with monitoring and health check tools for production database systems.
  • Exposure to cloud-native database services (AWS RDS, Azure SQL, Google Cloud SQL) and DevOps practices (e.g., CI/CD pipeline, Infrastructure as Code).
  • Ability to collaborate effectively with development teams for data modeling, schema design, and deployment.

Application Process

Applications must be submitted exclusively through the CDIPD Career portal: https://cdipd.duk.ac.in/career, on or before 22-09-2025. No other application methods will be accepted.
summary: Seeking an experienced Database Administrator to design, implement, and secure enterprise database systems. Role involves ensuring high availability, performance tuning, and supporting cloud and on-premise environments.

  • Familiarity with modern version control tools, especially Git.
  • Experience working within Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, etc.).
  • Strong problem-solving, debugging, and troubleshooting abilities.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  • Proven ability to mentor and guide junior developers.

Why you will love working with us?

  • Opportunity to work for the #1 Auto Super app in the US.
  • Opportunity to make a meaningful impact across 10+ million users.
  • Dynamic, fast-paced, and innovation-driven work culture.
  • Clear pathways for career growth in a rapidly scaling technology company.
  • Competitive compensation.

Apply Now: https://waydot.greythr.com/hire/jobs/senior-java-developer

job_description:
Software Solution Architect (Job Code: CDIPD/SSA/02/2025)

Organization: Kerala University of Digital Sciences, Innovation and Technology Centre: Centre for Digital Innovation and Product Development (CDIPD) Location: Technopark Phase-IV Campus (Technocity), Mangalappuram, Thonnakkal PO, Trivandrum, Kerala, 695317 Website: https://duk.ac.in Contact Email: directorcdipd@duk.ac.in

Published: 12, Sept 2025 Closing Date: 22, Sept 2025

Brief Description

The Centre for Digital Innovation and Product Development (CDIPD), under the Kerala University of Digital Sciences, Innovation and Technology (Digital University Kerala), is seeking highly qualified Indian citizens for project-based positions focused on Digital Innovation, Digital Transformation, AI, and Data Analytics. CDIPD develops cutting-edge digital solutions for enterprise-level projects and adheres to CMMI Level 3 standards. We offer an inclusive work environment with industry-standard processes, comprehensive support, and state-of-the-art infrastructure, providing exceptional career growth opportunities through challenging projects and exposure to cutting-edge technologies.

Applications must be submitted exclusively through the CDIPD Career portal (https://cdipd.duk.ac.in/career) by 22-09-2025.

Essential Experience

  • Minimum 10 years of experience in software design, architecture, and development.
  • Proven track record in designing scalable, robust, and high-performance software solutions.
  • Experience in microservices architecture, cloud computing, containerization (Docker/Kubernetes), and enterprise application development.
  • Strong background in system integration, API design, and security best practices.
  • Strong hands-on experience with Java, J2EE, Spring Boot, Microservices, RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL, MySQL, React, and Next.js.

Job Description

The Software Solution Architect will be responsible for designing, implementing, and overseeing scalable, secure, and high-performance software solutions. The candidate will collaborate with cross-functional teams to define technology roadmaps, solution frameworks, and best practices.

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Define and implement end-to-end software architectures that meet business and technical requirements.
  • Ensure alignment with industry best practices, security, and compliance standards.
  • Develop high-level architectural blueprints, technical specifications, and POCs.
  • Evaluate and recommend emerging technologies and frameworks to enhance system capabilities.
  • Provide architectural governance and ensure adherence to CMMI Level 3+ development processes.
  • Design and implement scalable, interoperable, and secure system integrations.
  • Establish API management frameworks, ensuring performance, scalability, and security best practices.
  • Architect cloud-native applications and hybrid cloud solutions.
  • Implement CI/CD pipelines and best practices.
  • Guide and mentor development teams in software design principles, coding standards, and architecture best practices.
  • Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to industry standards and best practices.

Desirable Qualification

  • Certifications in Enterprise Architecture (TOGAF, Zachman Framework) or Cloud Architecture (AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Google Cloud Architect, Microsoft Azure Solutions Architect Expert).

Desirable Experience

  • Experience in architecting solutions for large-scale IT/ITES organizations or digital transformation projects.
  • Knowledge of CMMI Level 3+ processes, Agile, and DevSecOps methodologies.
  • Familiarity with big data analytics, AI/ML integration.
  • Experience in developing highly available and distributed systems.

Required Skills

  • Expertise in software architecture, system design, and enterprise integration patterns.
  • Deep understanding of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and hybrid cloud solutions.
  • Strong knowledge of database design (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB), data modeling, and performance optimization.
  • Proficiency in DevOps, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure as code.
  • Excellent problem-solving, leadership, and technical mentoring skills.
  • Strong communication and stakeholder management abilities.
  • Strong mentoring and team interaction skills.
summary: Seeking a Software Solution Architect with 10+ years of experience in designing scalable, secure software solutions. Responsibilities include defining architectures, guiding teams, and ensuring best practices for digital innovation projects.
